Class ReflectDataFields

java.lang.Object
education.the_software_toolsmith.testing.framework.ReflectDataFields
public class ReflectDataFields extends Object
Reflective access to individual data fields
Version:
1.0 2025-07-19 Initial implementation - extracted from framework's Reflection
Author:
David M Rosenberg

    ReflectDataFields()

  • Method Details

    • getField

      public static Field getField(Object anInstance, String fieldName, String fieldType) throws TestingException
      Retrieve the value of a named reference field from an instance
      Parameters:
      anInstance - the instance to interrogate
      fieldName - the name of the field in anInstance to retrieve
      fieldType - the type of fieldName
      Returns:
      the value stored in the named field
      Throws:
      TestingException - any wrapped exceptions which may be thrown by reflection

    • getField

      public static Field getField(Class<?> theClass, Object anInstance, String fieldName, String fieldType) throws TestingException
      Retrieve the value of a named reference field from an instance
      Parameters:
      theClass - the class to search for this field
      anInstance - the instance to interrogate
      fieldName - the name of the field in anInstance to retrieve
      fieldType - the type of fieldName
      Returns:
      the value stored in the named field
      Throws:
      TestingException - any wrapped exceptions which may be thrown by reflection

    • reportFieldAccessFailure

      private static void reportFieldAccessFailure(Throwable thrown, String accessType, String fromTo, Class<?> theClass, Object anInstance, String fieldName, String fieldType) throws TestingException
      utility to report a field access failure via Reflection
      Parameters:
      thrown - the caught throwable
      accessType - typically "retrieve" or "retrieve or set"
      fromTo - typically "from" or "from/to"
      theClass - the class to search for this field
      anInstance - the instance to interrogate
      fieldName - the name of the field in anInstance to retrieve
      fieldType - the type of fieldName
      Throws:
      TestingException - wraps the caught throwable
      Since:
      1.0
